attributes.action: Gender variation (including transsexuality, genderqueer, genderfluid etc) to be taught during PSHCE lessons in all schools
attributes.additional_details:
There is not enough awareness amongst non-trans people about what it means to be gender varient, leading to dissregard of feelings of those that are gender varient, which can sometimes isolate them from the community.

Awareness and equality of LGB have come a long way, but in many aspects, T is still far behind.

If gender varience becomes part of the curriculum this will certainly help to reduce the incidences of transphobia in the next generation.

Transphobia must come to an end.
